title: Kirk Minihane Is the King of the Crazy People
description:
Golf champion Kirk Minihane has cured prostate cancer, but he's trying to stay humble. On today's podcast, the boys reflect on a wild week filled with tragedy and ultimately triumph. Benjamin Allbright, the man who almost got Dave Portnoy to fire Steve Robinson and Kirk Minihane, has apologized. Kind of. MHB's mind unravels before our very ears.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
